eligibilityTitle: Check if you can apply online
title: Excepted estates, estate valued
question: Have you worked out the estate’s value?
hint: Before applying for probate, you must work out the estate’s value (opens in a new tab) to check if you need to pay Inheritance Tax (IHT). You can use the IHT checker (opens in a new tab) to get these values.

eeEstateValued.required: Select ‘yes’ if you have worked out the estate’s value
